headline: Why Is Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) Among Diamond Hill Capital’s Top Stock Picks?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Diamond Hill Capital’s Top 10 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) stands against Diamond Hill Capital’s other stock picks.
